contents.text: In addition to monitoring a session, information in the LTEST message encapsulation header may also be used to compute an estimate of network propagation delay, as described in Section 8.2.1. However, the propagation delay limit SHALL NOT be enforced for LTEST traffic.
contents.zh-CHS: 除监控会话外，LTEST消息封装报头中的信息还可用于计算网络传播延迟的估计值，如第8.2.1节所述。但是，对于LTEST业务，不应实施传播延迟限制。

contents.text: 5.2.2.5. Use of TCP Features and Settings
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.2.5. TCP功能和设置的使用

contents.text: This section describes ground rules for the use of TCP features in an iFCP session. The core TCP protocol is defined in [RFC793]. TCP implementation requirements and guidelines are specified in [RFC1122].
contents.zh-CHS: This section describes ground rules for the use of TCP features in an iFCP session. The core TCP protocol is defined in [RFC793]. TCP implementation requirements and guidelines are specified in [RFC1122].translate error, please retry

contents.text: Table 1. Usage of Optional TCP Features
contents.zh-CHS: 表1。使用可选的TCP功能

contents.text: The following sections describe these options in greater detail.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节将更详细地描述这些选项。

contents.text: 5.2.2.5.1. Keep Alive
Keep Alive speeds the detection and cleanup of dysfunctional TCP connections by sending traffic when a connection would otherwise be idle. The issues are discussed in [RFC1122].
contents.zh-CHS: Keep Alive通过在连接可能处于空闲状态时发送流量来加快检测和清除功能异常的TCP连接。[RFC1122]中讨论了这些问题。

contents.text: In order to test the device more comprehensively, fibre channel applications, such as storage, may implement an equivalent keep alive function at the FC-4 level. Alternatively, periodic liveness test messages may be issued as described in Section 5.2.2.4. Because of these more comprehensive end-to-end mechanisms and the considerations described in [RFC1122], keep alive at the transport layer should not be implemented.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了更全面地测试设备，光纤通道应用程序（如存储）可以在FC-4级别实现等效的保持活动功能。或者，可按照第5.2.2.4节所述发布定期活性测试消息。由于这些更全面的端到端机制和[RFC1122]中所述的注意事项，不应在传输层实现keep alive。

contents.text: 5.2.2.5.2. 'Tiny' Segment Avoidance (Nagle)
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.2.5.2. “微小”段避免（Nagle）

contents.text: The Nagle algorithm described in [RFC896] is designed to avoid the overhead of small segments by delaying transmission in order to agglomerate transfer requests into a large segment. In iFCP, such small transfers often contain I/O requests. The transmission delay of the Nagle algorithm may decrease I/O throughput. Therefore, the Nagle algorithm should not be used.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC896]中描述的Nagle算法旨在通过延迟传输避免小段的开销，以便将传输请求聚合到大段中。在iFCP中，这样的小传输通常包含I/O请求。Nagle算法的传输延迟可能会降低I/O吞吐量。因此，不应使用Nagle算法。

contents.text: 5.2.2.5.3. Window Scale
Window scaling, as specified in [RFC1323], allows full use of links with large bandwidth - delay products and should be supported by an iFCP implementation.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC1323]中规定的窗口缩放允许充分使用具有大带宽延迟产品的链路，并且应该由iFCP实现支持。

contents.text: 5.2.2.5.4. Wrapped Sequence Protection (PAWS)
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.2.5.4. 包裹顺序保护（PAWS）

contents.text: TCP segments are identified with 32-bit sequence numbers. In networks with large bandwidth - delay products, it is possible for more than one TCP segment with the same sequence number to be in flight. In iFCP, receipt of such a sequence out of order may cause out-of-order frame delivery or data corruption. Consequently, this feature SHOULD be supported as described in [RFC1323].
contents.zh-CHS: TCP段由32位序列号标识。在具有大带宽延迟产品的网络中，可能有多个具有相同序列号的TCP段在传输中。在iFCP中，无序接收此类序列可能会导致无序帧传递或数据损坏。因此，应按照[RFC1323]中的说明支持此功能。

contents.text: 5.2.3. Terminating iFCP Sessions
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.3. 终止iFCP会话

contents.text: iFCP sessions SHALL be terminated in response to one of the events in Table 2:
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP会议应根据表2中的事件之一终止：

contents.text:
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
|                Event                      |     iFCP Sessions   |
|                                           |     to Terminate    |
+===========================================+=====================+
| PLOGI terminated with LS_RJT response     | Peer N_PORT         |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| State change notification indicating      | All iFCP Sessions   |
| N_PORT removal or reconfiguration.        | from the            |
|                                           | reconfigured N_PORT |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| LOGO ACC response from peer N_PORT        | Peer N_PORT         |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| ACC response to LOGO ELS sent to F_PORT   | All iFCP sessions   |
| server (D_ID = 0xFF-FF-FE) (fabric        | from the originating|
| logout)                                   | N_PORT              |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| Implicit N_PORT LOGO as defined in        | All iFCP sessions   |
| [FC-FS]                                   | from the N_PORT     |
|                                           | logged out          |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| LTEST Message Error (see Section 5.2.2.4) | Peer N_PORT         |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| Non fatal encapsulation error as          | Peer N_PORT         |
| specified in Section 5.3.3                |                     |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| Failure of the TCP connection associated  | Peer N_PORT         |
| with the iFCP session                     |                     |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| Receipt of an UNBIND session control      | Peer N_PORT         |
| message                                   |                     |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| Gateway enters the Unsynchronized state   | All iFCP sessions   |
| (see Section 8.2.1)                       |                     |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
| Gateway detects incorrect address mode    | All iFCP sessions   |
| to peer gateway(see Section 4.6.2)        | with peer gateway   |
+-------------------------------------------+---------------------+
Table 2. Session Termination Events
contents.zh-CHS: 表2。会话终止事件

contents.text: If a session is being terminated due to an incorrect address mode with the peer gateway, the TCP connection SHALL be aborted by means of a connection reset (RST) without performing an UNBIND. Otherwise, if the TCP connection is still open following the event, the gateway SHALL shut down the connection as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果由于对等网关的地址模式不正确而终止会话，则应通过连接重置（RST）中止TCP连接，而不执行解除绑定。否则，如果事件发生后TCP连接仍处于打开状态，则网关应按如下方式关闭连接：

contents.text: a) Stop sending fibre channel frames over the TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 停止通过TCP连接发送光纤通道帧。

contents.text: b) Discard all incoming traffic, except for an UNBIND session control message.
contents.zh-CHS: b) 放弃所有传入的通信量，但取消绑定会话控制消息除外。

contents.text: c) If an UNBIND message is received at any time, return a response in accordance with Section 6.2.
contents.zh-CHS: c) 如果在任何时候收到解除绑定消息，根据第6.2节返回响应。

contents.text: d) If session termination was not triggered by an UNBIND message, issue the UNBIND session control message, as described in Section 6.2.
contents.zh-CHS: d) 如果会话终止不是由解除绑定消息触发的，则发出解除绑定会话控制消息，如第6.2节所述。

contents.text: e) If the UNBIND message completes with a status of Success, the TCP connection MAY remain open at the discretion of either gateway and may be kept in a pool of unbound connections in order to speed up the creation of a new iFCP session.
contents.zh-CHS: e) 如果解除绑定消息以成功状态完成，则TCP连接可由任一网关自行决定保持打开状态，并可保留在未绑定连接池中，以加快新iFCP会话的创建。

contents.text: If the UNBIND fails for any reason, the TCP connection MUST be terminated. In this case, the connection SHOULD be aborted with a connection reset (RST).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果解除绑定因任何原因失败，则必须终止TCP连接。在这种情况下，应通过连接重置（RST）中止连接。

contents.text: For each terminated session, the session descriptor SHALL be deleted. If a session was terminated by an event other than an implicit LOGO or a LOGO ACC response, the gateway shall issue a LOGO to the locally attached N_PORT on behalf of the remote N_PORT.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于每个终止的会话，应删除会话描述符。如果会话被非隐式徽标或徽标ACC响应的事件终止，网关应代表远程N_端口向本地连接的N_端口发出徽标。

contents.text: To recover resources, either gateway may spontaneously close an unbound TCP connection at any time. If a gateway terminates a connection with a TCP close operation, the peer gateway MUST respond by executing a TCP close.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了恢复资源，任一网关都可以随时自动关闭未绑定的TCP连接。如果网关通过TCP关闭操作终止连接，对等网关必须通过执行TCP关闭来响应。

contents.text: 5.3. Fibre Channel Frame Encapsulation
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3. 光纤通道帧封装

contents.text: This section describes the iFCP encapsulation of fibre channel frames. The encapsulation complies with the common encapsulation format defined in [ENCAP], portions of which are included here for convenience.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍光纤通道帧的iFCP封装。封装符合[ENCAP]中定义的通用封装格式，为方便起见，此处包含了部分封装格式。

contents.text: The format of an encapsulated frame is shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 封装帧的格式如下所示：

contents.text: Figure 12. Encapsulation Format
contents.zh-CHS: 图12。封装格式

contents.text: The encapsulation consists of a 7-word header, an SOF delimiter word, the FC frame (including the fibre channel CRC), and an EOF delimiter word. The header and delimiter formats are described in the following sections.
contents.zh-CHS: 封装由7字头、SOF分隔符字、FC帧（包括光纤通道CRC）和EOF分隔符字组成。标题和分隔符格式将在以下部分中介绍。

contents.text: 5.3.1. Encapsulation Header Format
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.1. 封装头格式

contents.text: Figure 13. Encapsulation Header Format
contents.zh-CHS: 图13。封装头格式

contents.text: Common Encapsulation Fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 通用封装字段：

contents.text: Protocol# IANA-assigned protocol number identifying the protocol using the encapsulation. For iFCP, the value assigned by [ENCAP] is 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 协议#IANA分配的协议编号，用于标识使用封装的协议。对于iFCP，[ENCAP]指定的值为2。

contents.text: Version Encapsulation version, as specified in [ENCAP].
contents.zh-CHS: 版本封装版本，如[ENCAP]中所述。

contents.text: -Protocol# Ones complement of the Protocol#.
contents.zh-CHS: -协议是协议的补充。

contents.text: -Version Ones complement of the version.
contents.zh-CHS: -版本是版本的补充。

contents.text: Flags Encapsulation flags (see 5.3.1.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 标志封装标志（见5.3.1.1）。

contents.text: Frame Length Contains the length of the entire FC Encapsulated frame, including the FC Encapsulation Header and the FC frame (including SOF and EOF words) in units of 32-bit words.
contents.zh-CHS: 帧长度包含整个FC封装帧的长度，包括FC封装头和FC帧（包括SOF和EOF字），以32位字为单位。

contents.text: -Flags Ones complement of the Flags field.
contents.zh-CHS: -标志是标志字段的补充。

contents.text: -Frame Length Ones complement of the Frame Length field.
contents.zh-CHS: -帧长度是帧长度字段的补充。

contents.text: Time Stamp [integer] Integer component of the frame time stamp, as specified in [ENCAP].
contents.zh-CHS: 时间戳[integer]帧时间戳的整数组件，如[ENCAP]中所指定。

contents.text: Time Stamp Fractional component of the time stamp, [fraction] as specified in [ENCAP].
contents.zh-CHS: [ENCAP]中指定的时间戳分数分量[fraction]。

contents.text: CRC Header CRC. MUST be valid for iFCP.
contents.zh-CHS: CRC头CRC。必须对iFCP有效。

contents.text: The time stamp fields are used to enforce the limit on the lifetime of a fibre channel frame as described in Section 8.2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 时间戳字段用于强制执行第8.2.1节所述的光纤通道帧寿命限制。

contents.text: iFCP-Specific Fields:
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP特定字段：

contents.text: LS_COMMAND_ACC For a special link service ACC response to be processed by iFCP, the LS_COMMAND_ACC field SHALL contain a copy of bits 0 through 7 of the LS_COMMAND to which the ACC applies. Otherwise, the LS_COMMAND_ACC field SHALL be set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: LS_命令\u ACC对于将由iFCP处理的特殊链路服务ACC响应，LS_命令\u ACC字段应包含ACC适用的LS_命令第0位到第7位的副本。否则，LS_命令_ACC字段应设置为零。

contents.text: iFCP Flags iFCP-specific flags (see below).
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP标志iFCP特定标志（见下文）。

contents.text: SOF Copy of the SOF delimiter encoding (see Section 5.3.2).
contents.zh-CHS: SOF分隔符编码的SOF副本（见第5.3.2节）。

contents.text: EOF Copy of the EOF delimiter encoding (see Section 5.3.2).
contents.zh-CHS: EOF定界符编码的EOF副本（见第5.3.2节）。

contents.text: The iFCP flags word has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP标志字的格式如下：

contents.text: Figure 14. iFCP Flags Word
contents.zh-CHS: 图14。iFCP标志字

contents.text: iFCP Flags:
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP标志：

contents.text: SES 1 = Session control frame (TRP and SPC MUST be 0)
contents.zh-CHS: SES 1=会话控制帧（TRP和SPC必须为0）

contents.text: TRP 1 = Address transparent mode enabled
contents.zh-CHS: TRP 1=地址透明模式已启用

contents.text: 0 = Address translation mode enabled
SPC 1 = Frame is part of a link service message requiring special processing by iFCP prior to forwarding to the destination N_PORT.
contents.zh-CHS: SPC 1=帧是链路服务消息的一部分，需要在转发到目标N_端口之前由iFCP进行特殊处理。

contents.text: 5.3.1.1. Common Encapsulation Flags
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.1.1. 通用封装标志

contents.text: The iFCP usage of the common encapsulation flags defined in [ENCAP] is shown in Figure 15:
contents.zh-CHS: [ENCAP]中定义的通用封装标志的iFCP用法如图15所示：

contents.text: Figure 15. iFCP Common Encapsulation Flags
contents.zh-CHS: 图15。通用封装标志

contents.text: For iFCP, the CRC field MUST be valid, and CRCV MUST be set to one.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于iFCP，CRC字段必须有效，并且CRCV必须设置为1。

contents.text: 5.3.2. SOF and EOF Delimiter Fields
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.2. SOF和EOF分隔符字段

contents.text: The format of the delimiter fields is shown below.
contents.zh-CHS: 分隔符字段的格式如下所示。

contents.text: Figure 16. FC Frame Encapsulation Format
contents.zh-CHS: 图16。FC帧封装格式

contents.text: SOF (bits 0-7 and bits 8-15 in word 0): iFCP uses the following subset of the SOF fields specified in [ENCAP]. For convenience, these are reproduced in Table 3. The authoritative encodings should be obtained from [ENCAP].
contents.zh-CHS: SOF（字0中的位0-7和位8-15）：iFCP使用[ENCAP]中指定的SOF字段的以下子集。为方便起见，表3中重现了这些数据。权威编码应从[ENCAP]获取。

contents.text: Table 3. Translation of FC SOF Values to SOF Field Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 表3。将FC SOF值转换为SOF字段内容

contents.text: -SOF (bits 16-23 and 24-31 in word 0): The -SOF fields contain the ones complement the value in the SOF fields.
contents.zh-CHS: -SOF（字0中的位16-23和24-31）：-SOF字段包含补充SOF字段中值的字段。

contents.text: EOF (bits 0-7 and 8-15 in word n): iFCP uses the following subset of EOF fields specified in [ENCAP]. For convenience, these are reproduced in Table 4. The authoritative encodings should be obtained from [ENCAP].
contents.zh-CHS: EOF（字n中的位0-7和8-15）：iFCP使用[ENCAP]中指定的以下EOF字段子集。为方便起见，表4中重现了这些数据。权威编码应从[ENCAP]获取。

contents.text: Table 4. Translation of FC EOF Values to EOF Field Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 表4。将FC EOF值转换为EOF字段内容

contents.text: -EOF (bits 16-23 and 24-31 in word n): The -EOF fields contain the ones complement the value in the EOF fields.
contents.zh-CHS: -EOF（字n中的位16-23和24-31）：-EOF字段包含补充EOF字段值的字段。

contents.text: iFCP implementations SHALL place a copy of the SOF and EOF delimiter codes in the appropriate header fields.
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP实施应将SOF和EOF分隔符代码的副本放在适当的标题字段中。

contents.text: 5.3.3. Frame Encapsulation
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.3. 框架封装

contents.text: A fibre channel Frame to be encapsulated MUST first be validated as described in [FC-FS]. Any frames received from a locally attached fibre channel device that do not pass the validity tests in [FC-FS] SHALL be discarded by the gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 要封装的光纤通道帧必须首先按照[FC-FS]中的说明进行验证。网关应丢弃从本地连接的光纤通道设备接收的未通过[FC-FS]中有效性测试的任何帧。

contents.text: If the frame is a PLOGI ELS, the creation of an iFCP session, as described in Section 7.3.1.7, may precede encapsulation. Once the session has been created, frame encapsulation SHALL proceed as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果框架是PLOGI ELS，则如第7.3.1.7节所述，可在封装之前创建iFCP会话。创建会话后，帧封装应按以下步骤进行。

contents.text: The S_ID and D_ID fields in the frame header SHALL be referenced to look up the iFCP session descriptor (see Section 5.2.2.2). If no iFCP session descriptor exists, the frame SHALL be discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 帧头中的S_ID和D_ID字段应被引用以查找iFCP会话描述符（见第5.2.2.2节）。如果不存在iFCP会话描述符，则应丢弃该帧。

contents.text: Frame types submitted for encapsulation and forwarding on the IP network SHALL have one of the SOF delimiters in Table 3 and an EOF delimiter from Table 4. Other valid frame types MUST be processed internally by the gateway as specified in the appropriate fibre channel specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 提交用于IP网络封装和转发的帧类型应具有表3中的一个SOF分隔符和表4中的一个EOF分隔符。其他有效帧类型必须由网关按照相应光纤通道规范中的规定在内部处理。

contents.text: If operating in address translation mode and processing a special link service message requiring the inclusion of supplemental data, the gateway SHALL format the frame payload and add the supplemental information specified in Section 7.1. The gateway SHALL then calculate a new FC CRC on the reformatted frame.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在地址转换模式下运行并处理需要包含补充数据的特殊链路服务消息，网关应格式化帧有效载荷并添加第7.1节中规定的补充信息。然后，网关应在重新格式化的帧上计算新的FC CRC。

contents.text: Otherwise, the frame contents SHALL NOT be modified and the gateway MAY encapsulate and transmit the frame image without recalculating the FC CRC.
contents.zh-CHS: 否则，不应修改帧内容，网关可封装和传输帧图像，而无需重新计算FC CRC。

contents.text: The frame originator MUST then create and fill in the header and the SOF and EOF delimiter words, as specified in Sections 5.3.1 and 5.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，框架发起人必须按照第5.3.1节和第5.3.2节的规定，创建并填写标题以及SOF和EOF分隔符。

contents.text: 5.3.4. Frame De-encapsulation
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.4. 帧去封装

contents.text: The receiving gateway SHALL perform de-encapsulation as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 接收网关应按如下方式进行反封装：

contents.text: Upon receiving the encapsulated frame, the gateway SHALL check the header CRC. If the header CRC is valid, the receiving gateway SHALL check the iFCP flags field. If one of the error conditions in Table 5 is detected, the gateway SHALL handle the error as specified in Section 5.2.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到封装帧后，网关应检查报头CRC。如果报头CRC有效，接收网关应检查iFCP标志字段。如果检测到表5中的一种错误情况，网关应按照第5.2.3节的规定处理该错误。

contents.text: Table 5. Encapsulation Header Errors
contents.zh-CHS: 表5。封装头错误

contents.text: The receiving gateway SHALL then verify the frame propagation delay as described in Section 8.2.1. If the propagation delay is too long, the frame SHALL be discarded. Otherwise, the gateway SHALL check the SOF and EOF in the encapsulation header. A frame SHALL be discarded if it has an SOF code that is not in Table 3 or an EOF code that is not in Table 4.
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，接收网关应按照第8.2.1节所述验证帧传播延迟。如果传播延迟太长，则应丢弃该帧。否则，网关应检查封装头中的SOF和EOF。如果帧的SOF代码不在表3中或EOF代码不在表4中，则应丢弃该帧。

contents.text: The gateway SHALL then de-encapsulate the frame as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，网关应按如下方式解除框架的封装：

contents.text: a) Check the FC CRC and discard the frame if the CRC is invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 检查FC CRC，如果CRC无效，则丢弃帧。

contents.text: b) If operating in address translation mode, replace the S_ID field with the N_PORT alias of the frame originator, and the D_ID with the N_PORT ID, of the frame recipient. Both parameters SHALL be obtained from the iFCP session descriptor.
contents.zh-CHS: b) 如果在地址转换模式下操作，请将S_ID字段替换为帧发起者的N_端口别名，将D_ID替换为帧收件人的N_端口ID。这两个参数都应从iFCP会话描述符中获取。

contents.text: c) If processing a special link service message, replace the frame with a copy whose payload has been modified as specified in Section 7.1.
contents.zh-CHS: c) 如果处理特殊链路服务消息，则用有效载荷已按第7.1节规定修改的副本替换帧。

contents.text: The de-encapsulated frame SHALL then be forwarded to the N_PORT specified in the D_ID field. If the frame contents have been modified by the receiving gateway, a new FC CRC SHALL be calculated.
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，应将解除封装的帧转发至D_ID字段中指定的N_端口。如果接收网关修改了帧内容，则应计算新的FC CRC。

contents.text: 6. TCP Session Control Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 6. TCP会话控制消息

contents.text: TCP session control messages are used to create and manage an iFCP session as described in Section 5.2.2. They are passed between peer iFCP Portals and are only processed within the iFCP layer.
contents.zh-CHS: TCP会话控制消息用于创建和管理iFCP会话，如第5.2.2节所述。它们在对等iFCP门户之间传递，并且仅在iFCP层内处理。

contents.text: The message format is based on the fibre channel extended link service message template shown below.
contents.zh-CHS: 消息格式基于如下所示的光纤通道扩展链路服务消息模板。

contents.text: Figure 17. Format of Session Control Message
contents.zh-CHS: 图17。会话控制消息的格式

contents.text: The LS_COMMAND value for the response remains the same as that used for the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应的LS_命令值与请求的LS_命令值相同。

contents.text: The session control frame is terminated with a fibre channel CRC. The frame SHALL be encapsulated and de-encapsulated according to the rules specified in Section 5.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话控制帧以光纤通道CRC终止。框架应根据第5.3节规定的规则进行封装和去封装。

contents.text: The encapsulation header for the link Service frame carrying a session control message SHALL be set as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 承载会话控制消息的链路服务帧的封装头应设置如下：

contents.text: Encapsulation Header Fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 封装头字段：

contents.text: LS_COMMAND_ACC 0
contents.zh-CHS: LS_命令_附件0

contents.text: iFCP Flags SES = 1
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP标志SES=1

contents.text: TRP = 0
INT = 0
SOF code SOFi3 encoding (0x2E)
contents.zh-CHS: SOF代码SOFi3编码（0x2E）

contents.text: EOF code EOFt encoding (0x42)
contents.zh-CHS: EOF代码EOFt编码（0x42）

contents.text: The encapsulation time stamp words SHALL be set as described for each message type.
contents.zh-CHS: 封装时间戳字应按照每种消息类型的说明进行设置。

contents.text: The SOF and EOF delimiter words SHALL be set based on the SOF and EOF codes specified above.
contents.zh-CHS: SOF和EOF分隔符应根据上述SOF和EOF代码进行设置。

contents.text: Table 6 lists the values assigned to byte 0 of the LS_COMMAND field for iFCP session control messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 表6列出了分配给iFCP会话控制消息LS_命令字段字节0的值。

contents.text: Table 6. Session Control LS_COMMAND Field, Byte 0 Values
contents.zh-CHS: 表6。会话控制LS_命令字段，字节0值

contents.text: 6.1. Connection Bind (CBIND)
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1. 连接绑定（CBIND）

contents.text: As described in Section 5.2.2.2, the CBIND message and response are used to bind an N_PORT login to a specific TCP connection and establish an iFCP session. In the CBIND request message, the source and destination N_PORTs are identified by their worldwide port names. The time stamp words in the encapsulation header SHALL be set to zero in the request and response message frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第5.2.2.2节所述，CBIND消息和响应用于将N_端口登录绑定到特定TCP连接并建立iFCP会话。在CBIND请求消息中，源和目标N_端口由其全球端口名标识。在请求和响应消息帧中，封装头中的时间戳字应设置为零。

contents.text: The following shows the format of the CBIND request.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面显示了CBIND请求的格式。

contents.text: Addr Mode: The addressing mode of the originating gateway. 0 = Address Translation mode; 1 = Address Transparent mode.
contents.zh-CHS: Addr模式：发起网关的寻址模式。0=地址转换模式；1=地址透明模式。

contents.text: iFCP Ver: iFCP version number. SHALL be set to 1.
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP版本：iFCP版本号。应设置为1。

contents.text: LIVENESS TEST If non-zero, requests that the receiving INTERVAL: gateway transmit an LTEST message at the specified interval in seconds. If set to zero, LTEST messages SHALL NOT be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 活跃度测试如果非零，则请求接收间隔：网关以指定的间隔（秒）发送LTEST消息。如果设置为零，则不应发送LTEST消息。

contents.text: USER INFO: Contains any data desired by the requestor. This information MUST be echoed by the recipient in the CBIND response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户信息：包含请求者所需的任何数据。收件人必须在CBIND响应消息中回显此信息。

contents.text: SOURCE N_PORT NAME: The Worldwide Port Name (WWPN) of the N_PORT locally attached to the gateway originating the CBIND request.
contents.zh-CHS: 源N_端口名称：本地连接到发起CBIND请求的网关的N_端口的全球端口名称（WWPN）。

contents.text: DESTINATION N_PORT The Worldwide Port Name (WWPN) of the NAME: N_PORT locally attached to the gateway receiving the CBIND request.
contents.zh-CHS: DESTINATION N_PORT名称的全球端口名（WWPN）：本地连接到接收CBIND请求的网关的N_PORT。

contents.text: The following shows the format of the CBIND response.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面显示了CBIND响应的格式。

contents.text: Total Length = 36
contents.zh-CHS: 总长度=36

contents.text: Addr Mode: The address translation mode of the responding gateway. 0 = Address Translation mode, 1 = Address Transparent mode.
contents.zh-CHS: Addr Mode：响应网关的地址转换模式。0=地址转换模式，1=地址透明模式。

contents.text: iFCP Ver: iFCP version number. Shall be set to 1.
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP版本：iFCP版本号。应设置为1。

contents.text: LIVENESS TEST If non-zero, requests that the gateway INTERVAL: receiving the CBIND RESPONSE transmit an LTEST message at the specified interval in seconds. If zero, LTEST messages SHALL NOT be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 活跃度测试如果非零，则请求网关间隔：接收CBIND响应以秒为单位以指定间隔发送LTEST消息。如果为零，则不应发送LTEST消息。

contents.text: USER INFO: Echoes the value received in the USER INFO field of the CBIND request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户信息：回显在CBIND请求消息的用户信息字段中接收到的值。

contents.text: SOURCE N_PORT NAME: Contains the Worldwide Port Name (WWPN) of the N_PORT locally attached to the gateway issuing the CBIND request.
contents.zh-CHS: 源N_端口名称：包含本地连接到发出CBIND请求的网关的N_端口的全球端口名称（WWPN）。

contents.text: DESTINATION N_PORT Contains the Worldwide Port Name (WWPN) of NAME: the N_PORT locally attached to the gateway issuing the CBIND response.
contents.zh-CHS: 目标N_端口包含名称的全球端口名（WWPN）：本地连接到发出CBIND响应的网关的N_端口。

contents.text: CBIND STATUS: Indicates success or failure of the CBIND request. CBIND values are shown below.
contents.zh-CHS: CBIND状态：指示CBIND请求的成功或失败。CBIND值如下所示。

contents.text: CONNECTION HANDLE: Contains a value assigned by the gateway to identify the connection. The connection handle is required when the UNBIND request is issued.
contents.zh-CHS: 连接句柄：包含网关分配的用于标识连接的值。发出解除绑定请求时需要连接句柄。

contents.text:
CBIND Status       Description
------------       -----------

0 Success 1 - 15 Reserved 16 Failed - Unspecified Reason 17 Failed - No such device 18 Failed - iFCP session already exists 19 Failed - Lack of resources 20 Failed - Incompatible address translation mode 21 Failed - Incorrect protocol version number 22 Failed - Gateway not Synchronized (see Section 8.2) Others Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0成功1-15保留16失败-未指定原因17失败-无此类设备18失败-iFCP会话已存在19失败-资源不足20失败-不兼容的地址转换模式21失败-不正确的协议版本号22失败-网关未同步（请参阅第8.2节）其他保留

contents.text: 6.2. Unbind Connection (UNBIND)
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2. 解除绑定连接（解除绑定）

contents.text: UNBIND is used to terminate an iFCP session and disassociate the TCP connection as described in Section 5.2.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 解除绑定用于终止iFCP会话并解除TCP连接的关联，如第5.2.3节所述。

contents.text: The UNBIND message is transmitted over the connection that is to be unbound. The time stamp words in the encapsulation header shall be set to zero in the request and response message frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 解除绑定消息通过要解除绑定的连接传输。在请求和响应消息帧中，封装头中的时间戳字应设置为零。

contents.text: The following is the format of the UNBIND request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是解除绑定请求消息的格式。

contents.text: USER INFO Contains any data desired by the requestor. This information MUST be echoed by the recipient in the UNBIND response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户信息包含请求者所需的任何数据。收件人必须在解除绑定响应消息中回显此信息。

contents.text: CONNECTION HANDLE: Contains the gateway-assigned value from the CBIND request.
contents.zh-CHS: 连接句柄：包含来自CBIND请求的网关分配值。

contents.text: The following shows the format of the UNBIND response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下显示解除绑定响应消息的格式。

contents.text: USER INFO Echoes the value received in the USER INFO field of the UNBIND request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户信息回显在解除绑定请求消息的用户信息字段中接收到的值。

contents.text: CONNECTION HANDLE: Echoes the CONNECTION HANDLE specified in the UNBIND request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 连接句柄：回显在取消绑定请求消息中指定的连接句柄。

contents.text: UNBIND STATUS: Indicates the success or failure of the UNBIND request as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 解除绑定状态：表示解除绑定请求的成功或失败，如下所示：

contents.text:
Unbind Status      Description
-------------      -----------
0 Successful - No other status 1 - 15 Reserved 16 Failed - Unspecified Reason 18 Failed - Connection ID Invalid Others Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 0成功-无其他状态1-15保留16失败-未指定原因18失败-连接ID无效其他保留

contents.text: 6.3. LTEST -- Test Connection Liveness
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3. LTEST——测试连接活跃度

contents.text: The LTEST message is sent at the interval specified in the CBIND request or response payload. The LTEST encapsulation time stamp SHALL be set as described in Section 8.2.1 and may be used by the receiver to compute an estimate of propagation delay. However, the propagation delay limit SHALL NOT be enforced.
contents.zh-CHS: LTEST消息以CBIND请求或响应有效负载中指定的间隔发送。LTEST封装时间戳应按照第8.2.1节所述进行设置，并可由接收器用于计算传播延迟的估计值。但是，不得强制执行传播延迟限制。

contents.text: LIVENESS TEST Copy of the LIVENESS TEST INTERVAL INTERVAL: specified in the CBIND request or reply message.
contents.zh-CHS: 活跃度测试间隔的活跃度测试副本：在CBIND请求或回复消息中指定。

contents.text: COUNT: Monotonically increasing value, initialized to 0 and incremented by one for each successive LTEST message.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数：单调递增的值，初始化为0，并为每个连续LTEST消息递增1。

contents.text: SOURCE N_PORT NAME: Contains a copy of the SOURCE N_PORT NAME specified in the CBIND request.
contents.zh-CHS: SOURCE N_端口名：包含在CBIND请求中指定的SOURCE N_端口名的副本。

contents.text: DESTINATION N_PORT Contains a copy of the DESTINATION N_PORT NAME: NAME specified in the CBIND request.
contents.zh-CHS: 目标N_端口包含CBIND请求中指定的目标N_端口名称的副本。

contents.text: 7. Fibre Channel Link Services
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 光纤通道链路服务

contents.text: Link services provide a set of fibre channel functions that allow a port to send control information or request another port to perform a specific control function.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路服务提供一组光纤通道功能，允许一个端口发送控制信息或请求另一个端口执行特定的控制功能。

contents.text: There are three types of link services:
contents.zh-CHS: 有三种类型的链接服务：

contents.text: a) Basic
contents.zh-CHS: a) 基本的

contents.text: b) Extended
contents.zh-CHS: b) 延伸

contents.text: c) ULP-specific (FC-4)
contents.zh-CHS: c) ULP专用（FC-4）

contents.text: Each link service message (request and reply) is carried by a fibre channel sequence and can be segmented into multiple frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个链路服务消息（请求和回复）都由光纤通道序列承载，可以分割为多个帧。

contents.text: The iFCP layer is responsible for transporting link service messages across the IP network. This includes mapping link service messages appropriately from the domain of the fibre channel transport to that of the IP network. This process may require special processing and the inclusion of supplemental data by the iFCP layer.
contents.zh-CHS: iFCP层负责在IP网络上传输链路服务消息。这包括适当地将链路服务消息从光纤通道传输的域映射到IP网络的域。该过程可能需要iFCP层进行特殊处理和包含补充数据。

contents.text: Each link service MUST be processed according to one of the following rules:
contents.zh-CHS: 必须根据以下规则之一处理每个链接服务：

contents.text: a) Pass-through - The link service message and reply MUST be delivered to the receiving N_PORT by the iFCP protocol layer without altering the message payload. The link service message and reply are not processed by the iFCP protocol layer.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 直通-链路服务消息和应答必须由iFCP协议层发送到接收N_端口，而不改变消息负载。链路服务消息和应答不由iFCP协议层处理。

contents.text: b) Special - Applies to a link service reply or request requiring the intervention of the iFCP layer before forwarding to the destination N_PORT. Such messages may contain fibre channel addresses in the payload or may require other special processing.
contents.zh-CHS: b) 特殊-适用于在转发到目标N_端口之前需要iFCP层干预的链路服务应答或请求。此类消息可能在有效负载中包含光纤通道地址，或者可能需要其他特殊处理。

contents.text: c) Rejected - When issued by a locally attached N_PORT, the specified link service request MUST be rejected by the iFCP gateway. The gateway SHALL return an LS_RJT response with a Reason Code of 0x0B (Command Not Supported), and a Reason Code Explanation of 0x0 (No Additional Explanation).
contents.zh-CHS: c) 拒绝-当由本地连接的N_端口发出时，指定的链路服务请求必须被iFCP网关拒绝。网关应返回一个LS_RJT响应，原因码为0x0B（不支持命令），原因码解释为0x0（无其他解释）。

contents.text: This section describes the processing for special link services, including the manner in which supplemental data is added to the message payload.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述特殊链路服务的处理，包括向消息有效负载添加补充数据的方式。

contents.text: Appendix A enumerates all link services and the iFCP processing policy that applies to each.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A列举了所有链路服务以及适用于每个链路服务的iFCP处理策略。

contents.text: 7.1. Special Link Service Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1. 特殊链接服务信息

contents.text: Special link service messages require the intervention of the iFCP layer before forwarding to the destination N_PORT. Such intervention is required in order to:
contents.zh-CHS: 特殊链路服务消息在转发到目标N_端口之前需要iFCP层的干预。需要进行此类干预，以便：

contents.text: a) service any link service message that requires special handling, such as a PLOGI, and
contents.zh-CHS: a) 服务任何需要特殊处理的链接服务消息，如PLOGI，以及

contents.text: b) service any link service message that has an N_PORT address in the payload in address translation mode only .
contents.zh-CHS: b) 仅在地址转换模式下，服务有效负载中具有N_端口地址的任何链路服务消息。

contents.text: Unless the link service description specifies otherwise, support for each special link service is MANDATORY.
contents.zh-CHS: 除非链接服务说明另有规定，否则必须支持每个特殊链接服务。

contents.text: Such messages SHALL be transmitted in a fibre channel frame with the format shown in Figure 18 for extended link services or Figure 19 for FC-4 link services.
contents.zh-CHS: 此类消息应在光纤通道帧中传输，扩展链路服务的格式如图18所示，FC-4链路服务的格式如图19所示。

contents.text: Figure 18. Format of an Extended Link Service Frame
contents.zh-CHS: 图18。扩展链路服务帧的格式

contents.text: Figure 19. Format of an FC-4 Link Service Frame
contents.zh-CHS: 图19。FC-4链路服务帧的格式

contents.text: 7.2. Link Services Requiring Payload Address Translation
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 需要有效负载地址转换的链路服务

contents.text: This section describes the handling for link service frames containing N_PORT addresses in the frame payload. Such addresses SHALL only be translated when the gateway is operating in address translation mode. When operating in address transparent mode, these addresses SHALL NOT be translated, and such link service messages SHALL NOT be sent as special frames unless other processing by the iFCP layer is required.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述对帧有效负载中包含N_端口地址的链路服务帧的处理。只有当网关在地址转换模式下运行时，才能转换此类地址。在地址透明模式下运行时，这些地址不应被翻译，除非需要iFCP层进行其他处理，否则此类链路服务消息不应作为特殊帧发送。

contents.text: Supplemental data includes information required by the receiving gateway to convert an N_PORT address in the payload to an N_PORT address in the receiving gateway's address space. The following rules define the manner in which such supplemental data shall be packaged and referenced.
contents.zh-CHS: 补充数据包括接收网关将有效负载中的N_端口地址转换为接收网关地址空间中的N_端口地址所需的信息。以下规则规定了此类补充数据的打包和引用方式。

contents.text: For an N_PORT address field, the gateway originating the frame MUST set the value in the payload to identify the address translation type as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于N_端口地址字段，发起帧的网关必须设置有效负载中的值，以标识地址转换类型，如下所示：

contents.text: 0x00 00 01 - The gateway receiving the frame from the IP network MUST replace the contents of the field with the N_PORT alias of the frame originator. This translation type MUST be used when the address to be converted is that of the source N_PORT.
contents.zh-CHS: 0x00 01-从IP网络接收帧的网关必须将字段内容替换为帧发起人的N_端口别名。当要转换的地址是源N_端口的地址时，必须使用此转换类型。

contents.text: 0x00 00 02 - The gateway receiving the frame from the IP network MUST replace the contents of the field with the N_PORT ID of the destination N_PORT. This translation type MUST be used when the address to be converted is that of the destination N_PORT
contents.zh-CHS: 0x00 02-从IP网络接收帧的网关必须将字段内容替换为目标N_端口的N_端口ID。当要转换的地址是目标N_端口的地址时，必须使用此转换类型

contents.text: 0x00 00 03 - The gateway receiving the frame from the IP network MUST reference the specified supplemental data to set the field contents. The supplemental information is the 64-bit worldwide identifier of the N_PORT, as set forth in the fibre channel specification [FC-FS]. If not otherwise part of the link service payload, this information MUST be appended in accordance with the applicable link service description. Unless specified otherwise, this translation type SHALL NOT be used if the address to be converted corresponds to that of the frame originator or recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 0x00 03-从IP网络接收帧的网关必须引用指定的补充数据以设置字段内容。补充信息是N_端口的64位全球标识符，如光纤通道规范[FC-FS]中所述。如果不是链路服务有效载荷的一部分，则必须根据适用的链路服务说明附加该信息。除非另有规定，如果要转换的地址与帧发起者或接收者的地址相对应，则不得使用此翻译类型。

contents.text: Since fibre channel addressing rules prohibit the assignment of fabric addresses with a domain ID of 0, the above codes will never correspond to valid N_PORT fabric IDs.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于光纤通道寻址规则禁止分配域ID为0的结构地址，因此上述代码永远不会对应于有效的N_端口结构ID。

contents.text: If the sending gateway cannot obtain the worldwide identifier of an N_PORT, the gateway SHALL terminate the request with an LS_RJT message as described in [FC-FS]. The Reason Code SHALL be set to 0x07 (protocol error), and the Reason Explanation SHALL be set to 0x1F (Invalid N_PORT identifier).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果发送网关无法获得N_端口的全球标识符，则网关应使用[FC-FS]中所述的LS_RJT消息终止请求。原因代码应设置为0x07（协议错误），原因解释应设置为0x1F（无效N_端口标识符）。

contents.text: Supplemental data is sent with the link service request or ACC frames in one of the following ways:
contents.zh-CHS: 补充数据通过以下方式之一随链路服务请求或ACC帧一起发送：

contents.text: a) By appending the necessary data to the end of the link service frame.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 通过将必要的数据附加到链接服务帧的末尾。

contents.text: b) By extending the sequence with additional frames.
contents.zh-CHS: b) 通过使用附加帧扩展序列。

contents.text: In the first case, a new frame SHALL be created whose length includes the supplemental data. The procedure for extending the link service sequence with additional frames is dependent on the link service type.
contents.zh-CHS: 在第一种情况下，应创建一个新框架，其长度包括补充数据。使用附加帧扩展链路服务序列的过程取决于链路服务类型。

contents.text: For each field requiring address translation, the receiving gateway SHALL reference the translation type encoded in the field and replace it with the N_PORT address as shown in Table 7.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于需要地址转换的每个字段，接收网关应参考字段中编码的转换类型，并将其替换为表7中所示的N_端口地址。

contents.text:
+------------------+------------------------------------+
|    Translation   |          N_PORT Translation        |
|    Type Code     |                                    |
+------------------+------------------------------------+
| 0x00 00 01       | Replace field contents with N_PORT |
|                  | alias of frame originator.         |
+------------------+------------------------------------+
| 0x00 00 02       | Replace field contents with N_PORT |
|                  | ID of frame recipient.             |
+------------------+------------------------------------+
|                  | Lookup N_PORT via iSNS query.      |
|                  | If locally attached, replace with  |
| 0x00 00 03       | N_PORT ID.                         |
|                  | If remotely attached, replace with |
|                  | N_PORT alias from remote N_PORT.   |
|                  | descriptor (see Section 5.2.2.1).  |
+------------------+------------------------------------+
Table 7. Link Service Address Translation
contents.zh-CHS: 表7。链接服务地址转换

contents.text: For translation type 3, the receiving gateway SHALL obtain the information needed to fill in the field in the link service frame payload by converting the specified N_PORT worldwide identifier to a gateway IP address and N_PORT ID. This information MUST be obtained through an iSNS name server query. If the query is unsuccessful, the gateway SHALL terminate the request with an LS_RJT response message as described in [FC-FS]. The Reason Code SHALL be set to 0x07 (protocol error), and the Reason Explanation SHALL be set to 0x1F (Invalid N_PORT identifier).
contents.zh-CHS: 对于转换类型3，接收网关应通过将指定的N_PORT worldwide标识符转换为网关IP地址和N_PORT ID，获得填写链路服务帧有效载荷字段所需的信息。该信息必须通过iSNS名称服务器查询获得。如果查询不成功，网关应使用[FC-FS]中所述的LS_RJT响应消息终止请求。原因代码应设置为0x07（协议错误），原因解释应设置为0x1F（无效N_端口标识符）。

contents.text: After applying the supplemental data, the receiving gateway SHALL forward the resulting link service frames to the destination N_PORT with the supplemental information removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 在应用补充数据之后，接收网关应在删除补充信息的情况下，将产生的链路服务帧转发到目的地N_端口。

contents.text: 7.3. Fibre Channel Link Services Processed by iFCP
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3. 由iFCP处理的光纤通道链路服务

contents.text: The following Extended and FC-4 Link Service Messages must receive special processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下扩展和FC-4链路服务消息必须接受特殊处理。

contents.text:
Extended Link Service            LS_COMMAND   Mnemonic
Messages                         ----------   --------
----------------------
Abort Exchange                  0x06 00 00 00 ABTX
Discover Address                0x52 00 00 00 ADISC
Discover Address Accept         0x02 00 00 00 ADISC ACC
FC Address Resolution           0x55 00 00 00 FARP-REPLY
Protocol Reply
FC Address Resolution           0x54 00 00 00 FARP-REQ
Protocol Request
Logout                          0x05 00 00 00 LOGO
Port Login                      0x30 00 00 00 PLOGI
Read Exchange Concise           0x13 00 00 00 REC
Read Exchange Concise           0x02 00 00 00 REC ACC
Accept
Read Exchange Status Block      0x08 00 00 00 RES
Read Exchange Status Block      0x02 00 00 00 RES ACC
Accept
Read Link Error Status          0x0F 00 00 00 RLS
Block
Read Sequence Status Block      0x09 00 00 00 RSS
Reinstate Recovery              0x12 00 00 00 RRQ
Qualifier
Request Sequence                0x0A 00 00 00 RSI
Initiative
Scan Remote Loop                0x7B 00 00 00 SRL
Third Party Process Logout      0x24 00 00 00 TPRLO
Third Party Process Logout      0x02 00 00 00 TPRLO ACC
Accept

FC-4 Link Service Messages       LS_COMMAND   Mnemonic
--------------------------       ----------   --------
FCP Read Exchange Concise       0x13 00 00 00 FCP REC
FCP Read Exchange Concise       0x02 00 00 00 FCP REC
Accept                                        ACC

Each encapsulated fibre channel frame that is part of a special link service MUST have the SPC bit set to one in the iFCP FLAGS field of the encapsulation header, as specified in Section 5.3.1. If an ACC link service response requires special processing, the responding gateway SHALL place a copy of LS_COMMAND bits 0 through 7, from the
contents.zh-CHS: 根据第5.3.1节的规定，作为特殊链路服务一部分的每个封装光纤通道帧必须在封装头的iFCP标志字段中将SPC位设置为1。如果ACC链路服务响应需要特殊处理，则响应网关应从

contents.text: link service request frame, in the LS_COMMAND_ACC field of the ACC encapsulation header. Supplemental data (if any) MUST be appended as described in the following section.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路服务请求帧，位于ACC封装头的LS_命令_ACC字段中。补充数据（如有）必须按照下一节所述追加。

contents.text: The format of each special link service message, including supplemental data, where applicable, is shown in the following sections. Each description shows the basic format, as specified in the applicable FC standard, followed by supplemental data as shown in the example below.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个特殊链接服务消息（包括补充数据，如适用）的格式如以下部分所示。每个描述都显示了适用FC标准中规定的基本格式，后面是补充数据，如以下示例所示。

contents.text: Figure 20. Special Link Service Frame Payload
contents.zh-CHS: 图20。特殊链路服务帧有效载荷

contents.text: 7.3.1. Special Extended Link Services
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1. 特殊扩展链接服务

contents.text: The following sections define extended link services for which special processing is required.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节定义了需要特殊处理的扩展链接服务。

contents.text: 7.3.1.1. Abort Exchange (ABTX)
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1.1. 中止交换（ABTX）

contents.text: ELS Format:
contents.zh-CHS: ELS格式：

Address Translation     Type (see      (type 3 only)

                       -----------

contents.zh-CHS: 其他特殊处理：

contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1.3. 发现地址接受（ADISC ACC）

contents.text: 7.3.1.4. FC Address Resolution Protocol Reply (FARP-REPLY)
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1.4. FC地址解析协议应答（FARP-Reply）

contents.text: The FARP-REPLY ELS is used in conjunction with the FARP-REQ ELS (see Section 7.3.1.5) to perform the address resolution services required by the FC-VI protocol [FC-VI] and the fibre channel mapping of IP and ARP specified in RFC 2625 [RFC2625].
contents.zh-CHS: FARP-REPLY ELS与FARP-REQ ELS（见第7.3.1.5节）一起使用，以执行FC-VI协议[FC-VI]和RFC 2625[RFC2625]中规定的IP和ARP的光纤通道映射所需的地址解析服务。

contents.text: Format of FARP-REPLY ELS:

                       ------------
Requesting N_PORT 2 N/A Identifier

contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1.5. FC地址解析协议请求（FARP-REQ）

contents.text: The FARP-REQ ELS is used in conjunction with the FC-VI protocol [FC-VI] and IP-to-FC mapping of RFC 2625 [RFC2625] to perform IP and FC address resolution in an FC fabric. The FARP-REQ ELS is usually directed to the fabric broadcast server at well-known address 0xFF-FF-FF for retransmission to all attached N_PORTs.
contents.zh-CHS: FARP-REQ ELS与FC-VI协议[FC-VI]和RFC 2625[RFC2625]的IP到FC映射一起使用，以在FC结构中执行IP和FC地址解析。FARP-REQ ELS通常定向到已知地址0xFF处的结构广播服务器，以便重新传输到所有连接的N_端口。

contents.text: Section 9.4 describes the iFCP implementation of FC broadcast server functionality in an iFCP fabric.
contents.zh-CHS: 第9.4节描述了iFCP结构中FC广播服务器功能的iFCP实现。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1.6. 注销（徽标）和徽标ACC

contents.zh-CHS: ELS格式：

contents.zh-CHS: 无论有效的翻译模式如何，该ELS应始终作为特殊ELS发送。

contents.text: Other Special Processing:

contents.text: See Section 5.2.3.
7.3.1.7. Port Login (PLOGI) and PLOGI ACC
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1.7. 端口登录（PLOGI）和PLOGI ACC

contents.text: A PLOGI ELS establishes fibre channel communications between two N_PORTs and triggers the creation of an iFCP session if one does not exist.
contents.zh-CHS: PLOGI ELS在两个N_端口之间建立光纤通道通信，如果不存在iFCP会话，则触发iFCP会话的创建。

contents.text: The PLOGI request and ACC response carry information identifying the originating N_PORT, including a specification of its capabilities. If the destination N_PORT accepts the login request, it sends an Accept response (an ACC frame with PLOGI payload) specifying its capabilities. This exchange establishes the operating environment for the two N_PORTs.
contents.zh-CHS: PLOGI请求和ACC响应携带标识原始N_端口的信息，包括其能力的规范。如果目标N_端口接受登录请求，它将发送一个接受响应（带有PLOGI负载的ACC帧），指定其功能。此交换为两个N_端口建立操作环境。

contents.text: The following figure is duplicated from [FC-FS], and shows the PLOGI message format for both the request and Accept (ACC) response. An N_PORT will reject a PLOGI request by transmitting an LS_RJT message containing no payload.
contents.zh-CHS: 下图与[FC-FS]重复，显示了请求和接受（ACC）响应的PLOGI消息格式。N_端口将通过发送不包含有效负载的LS_RJT消息来拒绝PLOGI请求。

contents.text: Figure 21. Format of PLOGI Request and ACC Payloads
contents.zh-CHS: 图21。PLOGI请求和ACC有效载荷的格式

contents.text: Details of the above fields, including common and class-based service parameters, can be found in [FC-FS].
contents.zh-CHS: 上述字段的详细信息，包括通用和基于类的服务参数，可在[FC-FS]中找到。

contents.text: Special Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 特殊处理

contents.text: As specified in Section 5.2.2.2, a PLOGI request addressed to a remotely attached N_PORT MUST cause the creation of an iFCP session if one does not exist. Otherwise, the PLOGI and PLOGI ACC payloads MUST be passed through without modification to the destination N_PORT using the existing iFCP session. In either case, the SPC bit must be set in the frame encapsulation header as specified in 5.3.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第5.2.2.2节所述，如果不存在iFCP会话，则发往远程连接N_端口的PLOGI请求必须导致创建iFCP会话。否则，必须通过PLOGI和PLOGI ACC有效负载，而不使用现有的iFCP会话修改目标N_端口。在任何一种情况下，都必须按照5.3.3中的规定在帧封装头中设置SPC位。

contents.text: If the CBIND to create the iFCP session fails, the issuing gateway SHALL terminate the PLOGI with an LS_RJT response. The Reason Code and Reason Code Explanation SHALL be selected from Table 8 based on the CBIND failure status.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果用于创建iFCP会话的CBIND失败，则发出网关应使用LS_RJT响应终止PLOGI。应根据CBIND故障状态从表8中选择原因代码和原因代码解释。

contents.text:
+---------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| CBIND Failure | LS_RJT Reason     | LS_RJT Reason Code  |
| Status        | Code              | Explanation         |
+===============+===================+=====================+
| Unspecified   | Unable to Perform | No Additional       |
| Reason (16)   | Command Request   | Explanation (0x00)  |
|               | (0x09)            |                     |
+---------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| No Such       | Unable to Perform | Invalid N_PORT      |
| Device (17)   | Command Request   | Name (0x0D)         |
|               | (0x09)            |                     |
+---------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| Lack of       | Unable to Perform | Insufficient        |
| Resources (19)| Command Request   | Resources to Support|
|               | (0x09)            | Login (0x29)        |
+---------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| Incompatible  | Unable to Perform | No Additional       |
| Address       | Command Request   | Explanation (0x00)  |
| Translation   | (0x09)            |                     |
| Mode (20)     |                   |                     |
+---------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| Incorrect iFCP| Unable to Perform | No Additional       |
| Protocol      | Command Request   | Explanation (0x00)  |
| version Number| (0x09)            |                     |
| (21)          |                   |                     |
+---------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| Gateway Not   | Unable to Perform | No Additional       |
| Synchronized  | Command Request   | Explanation (0x00)  |
| (22)          | (0x09)            |                     |
+---------------+-------------------+---------------------+
Table 8. PLOGI LS_RJT Status for CBIND Failures
contents.zh-CHS: 表8。CBIND故障的PLOGI LS_RJT状态
